sourcesContent:
import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react' import './Sleepapp.css' export default function Sleepapp() { const sleephourRef = useRef() const sleepminRef = useRef() const [sleephour, setSleephour] = useState(0) const [sleepmin, setSleepmin] = useState(0) function handletime(e) { const hour = sleephourRef.current.value const minute = sleepminRef.current.value console.log(hour) console.log(minute) sleephourRef.current.value = null sleepminRef.current.value = null var tymmin = Number(minute)+30 var tymhour = Number(hour)+1 if (tymin>=60) { tymhour = tymhour+1; tymmin = tymin-60; } setSleepmin(s => s + tymmin) setSleephour(h => h + tymhour) } return (
{sleephour}:{sleepmin}
